text:
Hah...
It's actually happening huh, our debut...
Has the reality of it still not settled in?

I'm not really sure. So many different things happened
and then I was standing here before I realized it.

...One of those "different things"
was Mamimi earnestly trying her best though, wasn't it?

It's because of that, that you were able to reach
the day of your debut-live.

Fufuu, a bit stuffy as always, huh.
...But

It's because I had this kind of producer at my side
that I was able to try this hard.

Well, it's a special occasion and all,
I figured I should go ahead and say something like this.

Producer. Thank you so much 
for watching over me.
I hope you'll enjoy... my debut-live.
